text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, Spe-chan's race should be wrapping up right about now!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Are you fine not checking the results…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah, it's fine.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Besides, I already know without seeing it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe…… you really believe in Spe-chan, don't you?! And Trainer-san too!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I heard about it from Trainer-san, that you were fine without them seeing you off.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I wanted them to watch Spe-chan's race. Because I want her to take hold of that dream, without fail.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: We're also expecting big things from Suzuka's efforts!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: We're all cheering for you……!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I look forward to that "scenery" that I've never seen before.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Special Week, in a fierce battle to the finish, outlasts the Senior grade's most preeminent stayer, Mejiro Bright!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: This is the strength of the Derby Uma Musume! At last, the next grand battle will be at the [Spring Tenno Sho]!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Mejiro Bright was doing great as usual but, the title of "Golden Generation's" Derby Uma Musume isn't for show!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: I've got really high hopes for Special Week's run during the [Spring Tenno Sho]!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ……Bright.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Haa…… haa…… fuu～……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Intentionally lifting your legs higher, seems to be good stimulation for the quads…… Yeah, we should add this to Bright's training too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Ryan-oneesama……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Oh, Bright……? Seeing you during self-training is pretty unusual.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: I happened to spot Ryan-oneesama heading out, so I decided to follow.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: ……If it's alright, I thought I'd like to watch your training.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Bright…… Yeah, how about running together?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Haaa……! Haa…… haa……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Haa……… haaa……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Alright…… just like this, let's do one more!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Haa…… haa……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Bright……! If you don't work harder now, you'll come to regret―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: …… haa…… haaa……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ah…… I-I'm sorry…… I just……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ……have you caught your breath now?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Yes…… I apologize……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ah, don't apologize……! I was the one in the wrong……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… Really…… I'm sorry. I was just frustrated, because Bright lost……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Bright, I've been watching over you since you were small so, while I do treat you as special, there's more to it than that……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I feel like… I've been pushing my feelings on to you……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Bright seems like she's really similar to me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Having closing power to be proud of, having high expectations from people around you, but often one step short……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: While watching Ines and Oguri-san, and then McQueen, making my goal to be like them.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: That's why, when I see Bright, I get as frustrated as if I'm seeing myself, not wanting you to go through the same things I did……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Ryan-oneesama……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ah, Ahaha…… what the heck am I even saying? Bright is Bright after all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: If it's like this, it's more like I'm just pushing my pride and dreams on to you……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: ……If what you say is true, then I feel nothing but joy instead.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Eh……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: If it seems like my running is that similar to yours then, that is just proof of how genuine your feelings and expectations are.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: For someone like Ryan-oneesama who has supported me whole-heartedly, I've always wanted those feelings to be rewarded.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: As part of the Mejiro Family, while aiming for consecutive [Spring Tenno Sho] victories, more than that I want to win for Ryan-oneesama……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: If you say that Ryan-oneesama is pushing that dream on to me then, I will gladly carry that with me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Bright……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Well then, I can start running again now～. Without going easy on me, please continue the strict training.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Together we'll accomplish consecutive victories at the [Spring Tenno Sho].

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah, got it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I'll support you with everything I've got. I'll make sure you win……!
